StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetRecrui.ngRoles]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Type char(1) = 'E' AS
SELECT RECRUITING_ROLE_ID, SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM RECRUITING_ROLE WHERE PRODUCTION_BILLET = 'Y' AND ((@Type = 'E' AND RECRUITING_ROLE_ID NOT IN ('O', '0', '1', '2')) OR (@Type = 'O' AND RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = 'O') OR (@Type = 'N' AND RECRUITING_ROLE_ID IN ('0', '1', '2')))
